jade.mtp.http2
Class HTTPServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      jade.mtp.http2.HTTPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CascomGatewayServer
public class HTTPServer
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implements server side of HTTP message transport protocol.

Version:
0.1, 1.0, 1.1
Author:
Jose Antonio Exposito, MARISM-A Development group ( marisma-info@ccd.uab.es ), Nicolas Lhuillier (Motorola Labs), Ahti Syreeni - TeliaSonera

Nested Class Summary
static class HTTPServer.ServerThread
          ServerThread which reads the input, parses HTTP request using HTTPIO and delivers message to agent platform or let ConnectionManager to handle the request if it is not FIPA-request.
